::Battera:;

She watched Zardus walk past her in the hall. She turned and was 
about to say something, but decided to wait.  She followed him down 
the hall.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/Oblitertron::
> 
> Zardus lands at the entrance of the Alliance base, the Oblitercons 
seperating 
> and landing behind him. Hiss was carrying DevilDuer.
> 
> "Hiss, take him to a CR chamber. Dark One, I might need your help 
with the 
> femm you brought in."
> 
> Zardus enters the base, Hiss walking off toward the CR chamber and 
Dark One 
> following him. The rest of the Oblitercons walk off toward the CR 
chambers, 
> following Hiss to get healed.
